dmca.title: ElectronDesign complains to Google of copying
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern -

I am writing you regarding an apparent copyright violation by an Google Adsense publisher using the adsense publisher id pub-9126435844523724. Google AdSense advertisements appear on pages with content that I believe infringe on my copyright.

Content from my website, www.electrondesign.com has been copied and republished on the website http://www.bengkel.us without my permission.

Text from various sections of my site www.electrondesign.com have been copied and republished on this site at the following urls:

http://www.bengkel.us/bali-design-services/index.html
http://www.bengkel.us/bali-design-services/our-services.html

Specifically the 2nd and 4th paragraph on these web pages appear to have been copied verbatim from the home page of www.electrondesign.com/index.html, the first and third paragraphs.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Patrick Deese
[private]
Laredo, TX 78045
Telephone: [private]
[private]@gmail.com
